Text: Here yee. Here yee. If you are willing to buy wine out of a box because the built-in handle is your style. Well, this video can't help you. Butt, if want to  to "not" waste someone's time who knows about wine. (If you attempt approach them and engage in wine-talk or bring wine to an event) Then this is a 1st step to into the know. Even educates one on how cork is made. So, drink up, taste up and move away from being "un-dude" (or un-dudette). Be happy. Knowledge is power!
